metadata.name: Linguère
metadata.description:
Linguère is my AI-assisted creative tribute to my incomparable wife of West African roots, whose strength, resilience, and boundless creativity has always been an endless source of inspiration to me.

In this fantastical reverie brought to life, she is envisioned as a powerful and majestic ruler of wondrous worlds our children's children are yet to dream... barely any different from how she already is every single day of our lives!
